itemDescription: British Army officer, first Chief of the Defence Staff of Ghana

wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Victor Paley, KBE, CB, DSO, DL (1903–1976) was a British Army officer. In addition, he was seconded to the Ghana Army, to become the first Chief of the Defence Staff of the dominion of Ghana.

response: *Alexander George Victor Paley (Sir Victor Paley, KBE, CB, DSO, DL) (1903–1976) [descent from uncle George (1708–1765)]
* Major-General Alexander George Victor Paley, CBE, DSO (23862), late Infantry, General Officer Commanding, Ghana Army.
* Major-General Alexander George Victor Paley, , (23862), late Infantry (now retired). Lately General Officer Commanding, Ghana Army.
* Brigadier (temporary) Alexander George Victor Paley, ,  (23862), late Infantry.
